text: Alexa app won't sync with Echo Dot 4th generation. Device firmware 5.4.2, smartphone OS iPadOS 16. Connection times out.
Kindle app freeze indicates insufficient RAM. Force quit app, clear all cached data, disable background apps, then restart device.
Fire Stick outputs black screen after latest firmware update to version 4.8.5. Audio works but no video display.
Let's troubleshoot that crash. First, uninstall app completely, reboot Fire Stick, then reinstall from app store. Check OS compatibility.
Prime Video app version 6.12.1 crashes immediately on Echo Dot running iOS 17. Error code timeout error displays before crash.
Black screen after firmware update suggests display driver issue. Try factory reset Fire Stick to previous firmware version 5.2.2.
Kindle app freezes on loading screen. Fire Tablet 10 HD with 2GB RAM, 64GB storage. Cleared cache twice, still unresponsive.
